events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Assigning the case to an available refund specialist to process the customer's request swiftly.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you received the wrong item, and Iâ€™m here to help you get this sorted out.
Could you please provide the order number and upload a photo of the item you received so I can verify and process your refund?
Here is my order number 123456789 and I have attached a picture showing the item I received, which clearly is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. Thank you very much for handling this promptly.
The refund process has been initiated and the case is now resolved. Please check your account for the refund within the stated time frame.
Just following up to confirm if you have received the refund and if everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for the excellent support and prompt handling of the issue.
The support case has been closed as the customer confirmed receipt of the refund and expressed satisfaction.
